item.title: Company Downloads
item.description: Company Downloads DOs Use appropriate margin around the logo to let it breathe The Symbol can be used by itself Make sure the logo has appropriate contrast with the background If placing the logo over an image, make sure the area underneath is not busy If placing the logo over a busy image, darken or lighten the image using brand colors to ensure proper contrast DON'Ts Do not use the Logotype without the Symbol Do not vertically stack the Logotype & Symbol without special permission Do not add any effects to the logo or symbol (such as drop shadow, glow, etc.

item.title: Logo Colors
item.description: Logo Colors Mono Color Logo Sometimes, often due to production costs, only one color of ink is available and so the logo must be reproduced using only one color. In this scenario, the logo, logomark or wordmark must be used following the convention of using a light color type on a dark background or in a dark color type on a light background. Mono Color Logo â€” Outlined Kubo Sometimes, often due to production costs, only one color of ink is available and so the logo must be reproduced using only one color.

item.title: Logo Usage Guidelines
item.description: Logo Construction The logo contains the logomark and the wordmark. Both elements have been exactly positioned and proportionally fine-tuned. Clearspace It's important to maintain proper spacing around the logo to avoid overcrowding. Also, the use of whitespace keeps the brand feeling clean. Minimum Size When significantly reduced, the logo will become illegible. These are the pixel size units we recommend staying within to preserve quality of the logo.

item.title: Story
item.description: How The Cuboctahedron Came To Be: The Story Of Our Visual Journey From InfluxDB to InfluxData What began as InfluxDB will become InfluxData; going from product to platform. InfluxDB will become one of four products known collectively as the "TICK Stack". This transition of the company is the inception our efforts. Our goals:We want the logo to feel like a platform while maintaining its own unique identity.
